#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

SITG allows the user to digitize on any of their WMS Services.

= Details =

This includes the cadastral layers, which also contain adresses as points.

Any of these services can be used:
Connexion aux services WMS ArcGIS Server (normes 1.1.0, 1.1.1 et 1.3.0)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Orthophotos: http://etat.geneve.ch/ags2/services/Orthophotos_2005/MapServer/WMSServer

Plans Officiels: http://etat.geneve.ch/ags2/services/Plan_Officiel/MapServer/WMSServer

Cadastre: http://etat.geneve.ch/ags1/services/Cadastre/MapServer/WMSServer

Viticulture: http://etat.geneve.ch/ags1/services/Viticulture/MapServer/WMSServer


They are thinking about publishing all vector data to OSM. This will be discussed at a next steering committee. (after A Vieira de Mello, 28.01.2010)
